thread.title: Laura Ingraham on Flynn Leaks: 'This Is the Stuff Police States Do'
thread.title_full: Laura Ingraham on Flynn Leaks: 'This Is the Stuff Police States Do'

title: Laura Ingraham on Flynn Leaks: 'This Is the Stuff Police States Do'
text:
Laura Ingraham on Flynn Leaks: ‘This Is the Stuff Police States Do’ by Josh Feldman | 7:42 pm, February 14th, 2017 
Laura Ingraham believes that leaks in the Trump White House are coming from Obama administration holdovers, but also said this on Fox’s Special Report tonight: 
“This is the stuff police states do. They work to destroy the reputations of good people using information that is classified and private against individual citizens, and it should frighten anybody.” 
A Free Beacon report this afternoon says that Obama loyalists have been behind efforts to take down Trump and preserve the Iran deal. 
Ingraham added, “They want to undermine Trump as much as possible, and I think some of them have committed federal crimes in doing this.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
